org.elasticsearch.index.cache.query.parser

Interface QueryParserCache

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CloseableComponent, IndexComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NoneQueryParserCache, ResidentQueryParserCache

    public interface QueryParserCache
extends IndexComponent, CloseableComponent
    The main benefit of the query parser cache is to not parse the same query string on different shards. Less about long running query strings.
